jobDescription: As a Data Scientist at Presto you will be responsible for leading our companys data and analytics initiatives, while supporting our various product and business teams in making better decisions. You will have the opportunity to analyze and derive insights from the millions of consumer interactions we record each day. A qualified candidate must enjoy working with large data sets and relying on business acumen to form and test hypotheses.Youll be working on projects that drive value to our company and helping others optimize their work. We have data, and our customers are hungry for us to draw insights to that data. We are looking to leverage both traditional analytics and machine learning. Desired Skills and Experience 5+ years of data engineering or machine learning experience. Startup experience a plus!Work with product and business teams to determine how best to present data & insights to customers and executive audiences.Work with engineering to ensure data is being collected efficiently & accurately.Lead the design of machine learning models.Design analytics reports and dashboards for the internal business team as well as enterprise and SMB customers.Proficiency with SQL queries, columnar data stores, ML tools, and similar BI toolsKnowledge of at least one programming language (Python is a plus).Perform well in our take-home data challenge.Required:Minimum 5 years experience in a technical role related to data science or data analysis.Bachelor's degree (preferably in statistics, econometrics, computer science, engineering or other technical field.)
